name: Steam Headless
description: A Headless Steam Docker image supporting NVIDIA GPU and accessible via Web UI. Remote Game Streaming Server for playing games in browser with audio or via Steam Link/Moonlight.
notes: Requires privileged container for device access
GPU acceleration supported for NVIDIA, AMD, and Intel
Configure Steam library path to /mnt/games for persistent storage
Access via web browser at http://[container-ip]:8083
Default user password is 'password' - change after first login
Supports controller input and game streaming
For optimal performance, ensure adequate CPU and RAM resources
